metadata.dc:author: García García, B
Bernat Gili, A
Marcos Calle, J
Herrero Herrero, J
metadata.dc:description: Report of a case affecting a middle-age woman, 48, involving the E.N.T. area only. The AA comment on the features of the disease and report on the good results with medical treatment (prednisolone, indomethacin and dapsone).
metadata.dc:title: Policondritis recidivante. Cartilagopatia infrecuente.
[Relapsing polychondritis. An infrequent cartilage disease].
